title: Apple upside-down cake
ingredients: ['5 small dessert (eating) apples or 3 large apples', '135g caster sugar, divided', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, divided', '200g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '110g margarine, softened', '2 large eggs or 3 medium']
